That only way we can seem to fix it is to unplug and replug in the connector.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWe’ve always checked that they’re fully seated, everything physically seems fine. Though, it normally does it when the bot is first turned on, it does happen during matches, which does often cause issues with driving on a field.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAny ideas would be appreciated.
